title: The Martian Chronicles / The Illustrated Man / The Golden Apples of the Sun
description: Ray Bradbury ranks as the dean and grand eminence of science fiction. This giant omnibus volume collects three major works by this genre titan: The Martian Chronicles, The Illustrated Man, and The Golden Apples of the Sun. It would be nearly impossible to identify three works more central to sci-fi than this trio.
author: Ray Bradbury
